This folder contains a set of files from the EMP-Toolkit library that have been modified ad-hoc for use with CoVault. 

## Instructions

###  1. Download EMP-Toolkit
Before proceeding, ensure that you have downloaded the EMP-Toolkit library.

### 2. Replace Original Files
After downloading the EMP-Toolkit, replace the corresponding files in the EMP library with the modified versions provided in this folder. Be sure to place each file in its appropriate folder within the EMP library.

### 3. Install the Custom EMP Version
To install our custom EMP version, follow the installation steps provided in the EMP-Toolkit documentation.

## Note: Simplified Installation with setup.sh
The provided `setup.sh` script (main folder) already automates the above steps.

Note: These modified files are specifically tailored for CoVault. Using them outside this context may result in unexpected behavior.
